inputParameter.description: The number of times to run the test
inputParameter.name: loopCount

inputParameter.description: The number of 32 bit words to test
inputParameter.name: count

inputParameter.description: The address of the buffer to test, or zero to allocate one automatically
inputParameter.name: address

inputParameter.description: The name of the test to run: stuck-address, thorsten0f and thorsten16
inputParameter.name: testName
